rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a small waiting area and cloakroom. Features Scandinavian minimalism, clean lines, functional space.
Large living room with abundant natural light through large windows, integrated seating areas that open to the central courtyard for Vastu alignment.
Open-plan dining area adjoining the living room. Features modern Scandinavian design and is connected to the courtyard for fresh air and sunlight.

Efficient kitchen with clean surfaces, minimalistic cabinetry, integrated appliances, and a breakfast nook facing the courtyard. Includes functional storage following Vastu principles for auspicious placement of cooking.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, located in the quieter part of the house. Designed for privacy and tranquility, incorporating Scandinavian aesthetics.
Guest bedroom with ample storage space, positioned according to Vastu guidelines favoring relaxation and positive energy.
Third bedroom for additional family members or future needs. Includes functional built-in wardrobes, designed with Scandinavian simplicity in mind.
Fourth bedroom offering a balanced blend of function and style, suitable for children or as additional guest space, adhering to both design and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Reinforced door with sound insulation, designed in a Scandinavian style, offering secure access while preserving the aesthetic.
Large windows that ensure ample natural light for energy and positivity, strategically placed to face south or east as per Vastu guidelines.
Energy-efficient windows with Scandinavian design, ensuring ventilation and proper light distribution in the culinary area.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard that serves as a peaceful garden space. It is designed to enhance natural airflow, provide privacy, and adhere to Vastu principles by aligning with key cardinal directions for prosperity and balance.

rooftop_terrace.description: Rooftop terrace offering a relaxing outdoor area, ideal for gatherings, enjoying Scandinavian-style design elements such as minimalistic furniture, greenery, and water features in alignment with Vastu principles.
